    • getPovIfAvailable

      public AdvancedTrigger getPovIfAvailable(int povNumber)
      Uses the d-pad as a button source.
      Parameters:
      povNumber - 0 == Up, 90 == Right, 180 == down, 270 == left
      Returns:
      A trigger that represents the given POV direction.
